name: blockstack
description: The Blockstack Javascript library for authentication, identity, and storage.

scripts.compile-tests: rm -rf tests/unitTests/lib; rm -rf tests/authTests/lib; rm -rf test/operationsTests/lib; babel tests/unitTests/src -d tests/unitTests/lib; babel tests/authTests/src -d tests/authTests/lib; babel tests/operationsTests/src -d tests/operationsTests/lib;
scripts.dev-auth: npm run compile; npm run browserify; node ./tests/browserTests/auth-server.js
scripts.dev-proofs: npm run compile; npm run browserify; node ./tests/browserTests/proofs-server.js
scripts.unit-test: npm run lint && npm run flow && npm run compile && npm run compile-tests && npm run browserify && node ./tests/unitTests/lib/index.js
scripts.integration-test-auth: npm run compile; npm run compile-tests; npm run browserify; node ./tests/authTests/lib/index.js
scripts.integration-test-ops: npm run lint && npm run flow && npm run compile && npm run compile-tests && npm run browserify && node ./tests/operationsTests/lib/index.js
scripts.build: npm run build-documentation && npm run compile && npm run browserify
scripts.build-documentation: ./node_modules/.bin/documentation build src --config ./documentation.yml --format html --output docs; ./node_modules/.bin/documentation build src --config ./documentation.yml --format json --output docs.json
